NAME: Arrow Rain
EFFECT:
ACTION:
Select a board tile
Toss a D6
Apply the number of the die as DMG to the unity in the selected tile
Apply this number -2 to all linked unities

NAME: Balista
EFFECT:
Need to be SPAWN without attachments
CANNOT MOVEIF a unity is attached to this card:
ACTION
Select a Horizontal Direction (left or right) Apply 3 DMG to nearest card
(Cooldown for 2 turns)

NAME: Catapult
EFFECT:
ACTION:
Select a DIRECTION and Throw a D6:
Destroy any card at the range equal to number face-up -1
DMG all linked cards to the ATKed space with 3 DMG

NAME: Giga Shovel
EFFECT:
Select a FIELD card:
Destroy it.
Apply 2 DMG to any card occupying it

NAME: Duel Invitation
EFFECT:
ACTION:
Select one unity card from your hand and place face down.
Your opponent is gonna do the same.
After both cards are face-down flip them face up and battle each other.
The surviving card is placed on top of this artifact.

If both cards survives place them back into they owner's hand.

NAME: Burning Oil
EFFECT:
TRAP:
The ATKer of this card gets 3 DMG and BURN for 2 Turns

NAME: Sealed Gate
EFFECT:
SPAWN:Create a Wall Token in each vertical linked space of this card.
Unity cards cannot MOVE to the tiles where this card or the Wall Tokens occupy.

This card is treated a 0/10 card
AND cannot MOVE, BATTLE and gain any status or be healed
This card cannot SPAWN if it linked vertical tiles are not empty for the Wall Tokens

IF this card life reaches zero:
Destroy it and the Wall Tokens linked to it.

NAME: Sealed Rune
EFFECT:
TRAP:
Discard a card in hand with the same ATK or same HP as the ATKer
IF the ATK is equal: The ATK card becomes 0
IF the HP is equal: The Card is destroyed

NAME: Divine Shield of Barbaros
EFFECT:
ACTION:
ATTACH TO UNITY:
Enemy unities can only declare a ATK against this unity until next TICK.

TICK:
IF this unity survives:
Destroy this card and apply SHIELD to the unity

NAME: Chalice of Uncontrollable Power
EFFECT:
Select an Unity:
Add any number to it ATK
But the unity loses the same applied number to it HP

NAME: Book of Forbidden Spells
EFFECT:
ACTION:
Select an ally MAGE card and destroy it.
Apply it ATK value as DMG to all cards in a selected AREA
(One selected tile and all linked tiles to it)

NAME: "Peace" Sign
EFFECT:
IF this card is ACTIVE:
Unities cannot BATTLE against any other Unities.

This card cannot be protected of any BATTLE or Destruction Effect

NAME: White Flag of Surrender
EFFECT:
ATTACH TO UNITY:
The unity cannot BATTLE or be targeted in a BATTLE by any other unity as long this card is attached to it

NAME: Divine Sword of the Chosen
EFFECT:
ATTACH TO UNITY:
This unity becomes a DIVINE card.
The unity gains +1 ATK instantly and +1 ATK for each unity that this card destroy.

IF the atached unity is destroyed:
Put this card back at your hand
